channel.title: FTD Events on Fur Trade Days
channel.description: Recent content in FTD Events on Fur Trade Days

item.title: Forms
item.description: Entry forms, event signups, and posters will appear here.

item.title: Reunions
item.description: CHS Class of 1981, 40 year Reunion Friday evening, Social at Richard Sellman Ranch, time TBD Saturday, Class float in Parade, meet at 9 a.m. at 10th and Main streets Saturday evening, Dinner at Country Kitchen, time TBD Check out the Facebook Group or contact Julie Duncan via email. CHS Class of 2011, 10 year Reunion Friday evening, Dinner at EJ’s BBQ, time TBD Saturday, Class float in parade, details TBD Satruday evening, Informal social, downtown meeting place, details TBD Check out 2011’s Facebook Group or contact Leanne Ball (Hinrichs) via email.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Updated March 10, 2021 â€” Event times subject to change Thursday, July 8, 2021 5-10 p.m. - Mac’s Carnival (E 2nd & Bordeaux streets) 6-9 p.m. - Bands on Bordeaux - The Bar Flies (1st Street, between Main & Bordeaux streets) Friday, July 9, 2021 10 a.m. - Chess Tournament Begins (Chadron Public Library, E 5th & Bordeaux streets) 10:30 a.m. - Story Time & Crafts (Chadron Public Library, E 5th & Bordeaux streets)
